languages.text: "Да пусть их обоих пустотный кракен пожрет!" {n}Винтерскейл кривится, со злостью стискивая кулаки.{/n} "Делают вид, что у них в Просторе война с ересью только начинается. Ха! Я же живу в ней не первый десяток лет. И не нуждаюсь ни в пастыре-инквизиторе, ни уж тем более в дружбе с Инцендией".

traits.locale_text: "Да пусть их обоих пустотный кракен пожрет!" {n}Винтерскейл кривится, со злостью стискивая кулаки.{/n} "Делают вид, что у них в Пространстве война с ерестью только начинается. Ха! Я же живу в ней не первый десяток лет. И не нуждаюсь ни в пастыре-инквизиторе, ни уж тем более в дружбе с Инцендией".

languages.text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"
languages.original_text: "Да пусть их обоих пустотный кракен пожрет!" {n}Винтерскейл кривится, со злостью стискивая кулаки.{/n} "Делают вид, что у них в Просторе война с ересью только начинается. Ха! Я же живу в ней не первый десяток лет. И не нуждаюсь ни в пастыре-инквизиторе, ни уж тем более в дружбе с Инцендией".

traits.locale_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war with heresy in the Expanse is just starting, Ha! I've been living it for a few decades. And don't need neither an Inquisitor pastor, and especially nor Incendia's friendship!

I've been living it for a few decades. And don't need neither an Inquisitor pastor, and especially nor Incendia's friendship!

I've been living it for a few decades. And don't need an Inquisitor pastor, and especially don´t need Incendia's friendship!"

I've been living it for a few decades. And don't need an Inquisitor pastor, and especially don´t need Incendia's friendship!"

"A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

"A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

languages.text: «¡Por lo que a mí respecta, como si un kraken del vacío se los come a ambos!». {n}Winterscale tuerce el gesto y aprieta los puños muy enfadado.{/n} «Actúan como si la guerra contra la herejía en la Extensión acabase de empezar. ¡Ja! Yo la llevo librando unas cuantas décadas. ¡No necesito que me predique un inquisidor, ni mucho menos la buena voluntad de Incendia!».
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por lo que a mí respecta, como si un kraken del vacío se los come a ambos!». {n}Winterscale tuerce el gesto y aprieta los puños muy enfadado.{/n} «Actúan como si la guerra contra la herejía en la Extensión acabase de empezar. ¡Ja! Yo la llevo librando unas cuantas décadas. ¡No necesito que me pastoree un inquisidor, ni mucho menos la amistad de Incendia!».

languages.text: “就算虚空海怪把他们俩都活吞了，我也不在乎！”{n}温特斯凯尔咬紧了牙，愤怒地握紧拳头。{/n}“他们搞得就好像整个科罗努斯扩区刚刚才和异形开战一样！哈！我已经和它们开战几十年了！我不需要审判官的布道，更不需要因森蒂娅的好意！”
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: “就算虚空海怪把他们俩都活吞了，我也不在乎！”{n}温特斯凯尔咬紧了牙，愤怒地握紧拳头。{/n}“他们搞得就好像整个科罗努斯扩区刚刚才和异形开战一样！哈！我已经和它们开战几十年了！我不需要审判官的教训，更不需要因森蒂娅的友谊！”

languages.text: {n}Winterscale serre les poings de colère et s'exclame en grimaçant :{/n} « Qu'ils se fassent dévorer par un kraken du vide, tous autant qu'ils sont ! À les entendre, on dirait que la guerre contre l'hérésie dans les Étendues vient de commencer... Ha ! Ça fait des décennies que je mène ce combat. Je n'ai pas besoin d'un prêcheur inquisiteur, et encore moins de la bonne volonté d'Incendia ! »
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale serre les poings de colère et s'exclame en grimaçant :{/n} « Qu'ils se fassent dévorer par un kraken du vide, tous autant qu'ils sont ! À les entendre, on dirait que la guerre contre l'hérésie dans les Étendues vient de commencer... Ha ! Ça fait des dizaines d'années que je mène ce combat. Je n'ai pas besoin d'un pasteur inquisiteur, et encore moins du soutien d'Incendia ! »

languages.text: 「ヴォイド・クラーケンに2人とも食われてしまおうが構わんさ！」{n}ウィンタースケールは苦笑いを浮かべ、怒りに拳を握る。{/n}「さも、エクスパンスでの異端との戦争が始まったばかりであるかのようだな、ハッ！俺は数十年もの間、その渦中で生きてきた。異端審問官の羊飼いも、インセンディアとの友情も当然必要ない！」
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイド・クラーケンに2人とも食われてしまおうが構わんさ！」{n}ウィンタースケールは苦笑いを浮かべ、怒りに拳を握る。{/n}「さも、エクスパンスでの異端との戦争が始まったばかりであるかのようだな、ハッ！俺は数十年もの間、その渦中で生きてきた。異端審問官の羊飼いも、インセンディアとの友情も当然必要ない！」

languages.text: "Von mir aus kann sie ein Leerenkrake fressen!" {n}Winterzunder macht ein trockenes Gesicht und ballt zornig die Fäuste.{/n} "Sie tun, als würde ihr Krieg gegen die Ketzerei in der Ausdehnung gerade erst anfangen. Ha! Ich lebe ihn seit Jahrzehnten. Und ich brauche keinen inquisitorischen Priester, und ganz gewiss brauche ich Incendias Gunst nicht!"
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: "Von mir aus kann sie ein Leerenkrake fressen!" {n}Winterzunder macht ein trockenes Gesicht und ballt zornig die Fäuste.{/n} "Sie tun, als würde ihr Krieg mit der Ketzerei in der Ausdehnung gerade ernst anfangen, ha! Ich lebe ihn seit Jahrzehnten. Und ich brauche keinen Pastor der Inquisition, und ganz gewiss brauche ich Incendias Freundschaft nicht!"

languages.text: "İsterse uçsuz krakeni yesin ikisini de. Hiç umurumda değil!" {n}Winterscale, yüzünü buruşturarak öfkeyle yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Sanki Enginlik'te kâfirliğe karşı savaşları yeni başlamış gibi davranıyorlar. Hah! O savaşı onlarca yıldır yaşıyorum ben. Ayrıca bir Engizisyon vaizine, hele ki İncendia'nın iyi niyetine hiç ihtiyacım yok!"
languages.original_text: "A void kraken may eat them both, for all I care!" {n}Winterscale makes a wry face and clenches his fists in anger.{/n} "Acting as if their war on heresy in the Expanse is just starting. Ha! I've been living it for decades. And I don't need an Inquisitorial preacher, and I certainly don't need Incendia's goodwill!"
